Name: Holovid Series: Lustful Ballad
Details: One of the most distributed and read news holovid and entertainment magazines in the Rimward Periphery, the Lustful is edited and published in the Canopian world of Ballad II. Besides providing coverage in Periphery and Inner Sphere current affairs in competition with ComStar's News Bureau, the magazine is also well known for its Pleasure and Entertainment sections, which are banned in several worlds.
